page.title: 10Technology on the Farm
page.content: Mr Stratton owns Manor Farm. He has an Apple computer for keeping accounts.He uses his computer for keeping a foward cash profile and a capital cash profile.A foward cash profile is for Mr stratton to estimate how much he is going to spend in the year ahead.A capital profile shows money coming in to be spent on development.At harvest time the grain is put into corn bins and weighed by electronic scales.In the pocket of every tractor driver there is an eletronic code which is fed into the computer.The computer can pick up which field the grain has come from and how much it is worth.At the end of every harvest M r Stratton knows how much he has earned on every field.
